subject: Express Order Tracking
description_text:
Greetings,

I recently ordered a set of Pro X Ultra pedals with express shipping.
The order was placed on 12th of December and I haven't received the package or a tracking number yet. Looking at the delivery time of 3-7 days, which terminates today, I wonder if there is any info you can give me on the status of the order.

Order Nr.: #SSN4742

Kind Regards, Jonas Roth

conversations.body_text:
Greetings,

I want to add that both the button for "View Ticket" and the provided link do not work. It prompts me to log in, but I don't even have an account and signing in via google does not grant me access to the ticket (probably because its a different mail).
Creating an account does not prompt me to set a password, only asks for my mail and name and does not send a verification mail to set a password either. Trying to log in then tells me I put in the wrong password (because I didn't set any).
I can not access the tickets on the freshdesk support page at all.

Regards, Jonas Roth
service@simsonn.com
Hi Jonas Roth, We apologize for the delay; the warehouse in Germany is temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.
